statements: SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity <= 10;
SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date IS NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date, alert_threshold FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE alert_threshold > 5;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE alert_threshold < 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date < NOW() OR alert_threshold IS NULL;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, expiration_date, alert_threshold FROM FreshProduceInventory ORDER BY alert_threshold DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-05-01'
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM Alerts
SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'Apple%' AND quantity >= 10;
SELECT product_name, alert_type, alert_message FROM FreshProduceInventory JOIN Alerts ON FreshProduceInventory.product_id = Alerts.product_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-10-01' AND expiration_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date;
SELECT FPI.product_name, FPI.quantity, A.alert_type, A.alert_message FROM FreshProduceInventory FPI JOIN Alerts A ON FPI.product_id = A.product_id WHERE FPI.quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM fresh_produce_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM fresh_produce_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, threshold, alert_date FROM low_inventory_alerts WHERE threshold < 10 ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM expired_inventory_alerts WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT name, quantity FROM fresh_produce_inventory WHERE name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM fresh_produce_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-09-30' ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, quantity FROM fresh_produce_inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND expiration_date < '2022-10-31' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, name ASC;
SELECT id, name, expiration_date FROM fresh_produce_inventory WHERE expiration_date < CURDATE() ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM low_inventory_alerts WHERE threshold < 5 ORDER BY alert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, alert_date FROM expired_inventory_alerts WHERE expiration_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY alert_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM products ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM suppliers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY supplier_id;
SELECT id, name, quantity, expiration_date FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;

SELECT suppliers.name, suppliers.email, inventory.quantity, inventory.purchase_date FROM suppliers JOIN inventory ON suppliers.id = inventory.supplier_id WHERE inventory.quantity < 50 ORDER BY inventory.purchase_date ASC;

SELECT products.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, inventory.quantity, inventory.purchase_date FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id JOIN suppliers ON inventory.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE products.name LIKE 'A%' AND suppliers.name LIKE '%LLC%' ORDER BY suppliers.name ASC, inventory.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT products.name, suppliers.name AS supplier_name, inventory.quantity, inventory.purchase_date FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.id = inventory.product_id JOIN suppliers ON inventory.supplier_id = suppliers.id WHERE inventory.quantity <= 10 AND suppliers.email NOT LIKE '%example.com' ORDER BY suppliers.name ASC, inventory.purchase_date DESC;

SELECT alerts.id, alerts.alert_type, alerts.alert_message, inventory.quantity, inventory.purchase_date FROM alerts JOIN inventory ON alerts.id = inventory.product_id WHERE alerts.alert_type = 'Low Quantity' ORDER BY inventory.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM FreshProduceInventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT product_id, expiration_date, quantity FROM FreshProduceInventory ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_price FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierInventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierInventory.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_price, supply_date FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierInventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierInventory.supplier_id;
SELECT product_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM FreshProduceInventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_price FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierInventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierInventory.supplier_id WHERE supplier_price > 20 ORDER BY supplier_price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, supplier_price, product_name, supply_date FROM Suppliers JOIN SupplierInventory ON Suppliers.supplier_id = SupplierInventory.supplier_id JOIN FreshProduceInventory ON SupplierInventory.product_id = FreshProduceInventory.product_id ORDER BY supply_date ASC;
